Wysiwym Development Editor

The editor on this page is using wysiwym. The library lends itself to be easily adapted to other markup languages not currently implemented. If you write an extention for another markup language and would like to help out with this package, I would love to include it in future releases. You can download or contibute via the jquery-wysiwym Bitbucket repository.

Examples: Markdown, MediaWiki, BBCode (Devel)
